Function Documentation

function ellipseMatrix ( in  phobj,
in  y0,
in  x0,
in  a,
in  b,
in  teta,
in  Image,
in  color 
)

Set the elements of the Matrix Image which are in the interior of the ellipse E with the value 'color'.

The ellipse E has center (y0, x0), the major axe = a, the minor axe = b, and teta is the angle macked by the major axe with the orizontal axe.

Parameters:
y0 center of ellipse - y coordinate
x0 center of ellipse - x coordinate
a major axe
b minor axe
teta angle
Image image
color 
Return values:
ret elipse object
